system.description:
Your insight into all matters arcane reaches well beyond the limits of normal wizards, as does your dedication to it.  You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain the Bestow Magic ability if you do not already have it, but may only bestow spells on both the witch and wizard spell lists.  Alternatively, if you would normally have the Bestow Magic feature you may use it on any witch or wizard spell you have prepared and may imbue a number of spells at a time equal to 1/2 your proficiency bonus, rounded down.
  • You add your witch and wizard levels together for the purpose of the Signature Spells ability. You may only choose spells on both the wizard and witch spell lists for signature spells higher level than your wizard level alone would qualify for, but may choose any spell in your wizard spell book or on the witch spell list for those your wizard level alone would qualify for.
  • You gain one option from the wizard Spell Intensity ability.
